name: Space Gallery
overview: Space Gallery is a fast paced fixed screen space shooter for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Jeff A. Lapkoff and published in the following: - COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1985/07 (Issue #25) - Best of COMPUTE! & Gazette, - 64'er Spielesammlung #6 Blast those hostile aliens to their doom before they blast you to yours. Disgusting sky dogs occupied space. You should create dog-free zones. In infinity, that's damn hard!
